  • Constructor Details

    • PaymentMethodController

      public PaymentMethodController()
      Constructs a new PaymentMethodController. This constructor initializes the PaymentMethodDao that this controller will use to interact with the database for payment method operations. It sets up the necessary infrastructure for managing payment methods within the application.

  • Method Details

    • addPaymentMethod

      public String addPaymentMethod(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
      to add a new payment method to the database firstly validates the provided details If anyvalidation errors are found, it returns an error message. If the validation passes, it will then try to add the payment method into the database through the PaymentMethodDao.
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod - the PaymentMethod object containing all details to be added. It must not be null.
      Returns:
      a string indicating the result of the operation.

    • getPaymentMethodsForCustomer

      public List<PaymentMethod> getPaymentMethodsForCustomer(int customerID)
      Retrieves a list of all payment methods associated with a given customer from the database. If no payment methods are found for the customer, it returns an empty list.
      Parameters:
      customerID - of the customer whose payment methods are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of PaymentMethod objects associated with the specified customer; the list will be empty if no payment methods are found

    • updatePaymentMethod

      public boolean updatePaymentMethod(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
      Updates an existing payment method in the database. This method passes the PaymentMethod object to the PaymentMethodDao for updating the corresponding record. The PaymentMethod object should include all the fields that need to be updated
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod - the PaymentMethod object containing updated data for an existing payment method. It must include the payment method's ID and all fields that require updates.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful and affected one or more rows in the database, false otherwise.

    • deletePaymentMethod

      public boolean deletePaymentMethod(int paymentMethodId)
      Deletes an existing paymentMethod in the database Retrieves the customerID from the user session and calls the paymentMethodDao to delete the payment method for the specified customer
      Parameters:
      paymentMethodId -
      Returns:

    • validatePaymentMethod

      public String validatePaymentMethod(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
      Validates the payment method - validates the card number, name on card, expiry date and security code fields.
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod -
      Returns:
      String stating if the payment method was invalid
